info.name: Rahati Healthcare Platform API (localhost)
info.description: API collection for the Rahati Healthcare Platform running on localhost:8000

request.description: Authenticate user and receive access token
Get the currently authenticated user's details
Get paginated list of users (Admin only)
Get details for a specific healthcare center

body.raw:

request.description: Create a new healthcare center (Admin only)
Get list of appointments (filtered by user role)
Get details for a specific appointment
Get details for a specific consultation

request.description: Get list of accommodations (filtered by user role)
Get details for a specific accommodation
Get details for a specific room
